ValidationRule.description: Limit the Max Blocks to >= 1 and <= 20.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISNULL( CRMfusionDBR101__Max_Blocks_Shown__c ) ), OR( CRMfusionDBR101__Max_Blocks_Shown__c < 1, CRMfusionDBR101__Max_Blocks_Shown__c > 20 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If a value is set, it must be between 1 and 20.
